website_summaries.verdict: A multipurpose cover that blends heavy fabrics, light colors, and a large profile to fit and protect a variety of grills.
pros: Flexible fabric and large profile makes it easy to drop over many different grills up to 64" in width
Comes with a three-year warranty for random damage and accidents
cons: The fit can be loose depending on the specific grill

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product - avoid at all costs... Purchased 5/10 and within 3 months it has completely fallen apart - not just torn, but completely turned into dust!... I can't even blame it on the weather swing in Los Angeles where it has only rained twice since I began using...
customer_reviews.author: FT78_CL

customer_reviews.title: Stands Up to the Harsh Elements in Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in April or May of 2017 for my $800 Stainless Steel Grill. I live in Minnesota and the weather is brutal. This cover stayed out on our walk out patio over the entire winter. It has held up very nicely and has not faded as much as I would have thought. It's very difficult to find a good grill cover that won't crack, fade, rip, or tear in the elements. The material is awesome. I just ordered another one today for my $300 Smoker because I was so happy with the first cover from Classic Accessories. The one I bought today was on sale on Amazon Prime! Definately recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KandT

customer_reviews.title: Honored warranty twice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to leave a review to say how easy the warranty claim process is. I ordered this in 2015 and had two of them rip (not on seams) over 3 years. Classic Accessories honored both claims with the last one being OUT of warranty for one month. I figured I'd ask anyway and they honored it without issue. That's a trustworthy company in my book. To claim a warranty you just go to their website and follow the claim form.
customer_reviews.author: Edge

customer_reviews.title: Then it tears fairly easy, and doesn't protect anymore
customer_reviews.text: I use it to cover a Weber Genesis Grill. Plenty of room and cover seems to be made of a thick material. Color is light, which helps deflect the Sun. However, it appears to only last for 2-3 years. Then it tears fairly easy, and doesn't protect anymore. It seems that all covers only last 2-3 years. But this one is half the cost of the Weber Grill Cover (which I have owned and cracks after 2 years). Like I said it's ok, but don't expect it to last to long. Update. 4/23/17. I have this cover for less than a Year and already has 2 tears in it. I don't recommend this product. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Thick & Heavy Duty with Great Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I had this cover for over 2 years through Kansas weather, with it being put on/off the grill at least 100 times over that period. It finally started showing a tear on the top portion just recently. The color faded some over that period, but the lighter colors do not look bad either. Dreading the typical warranty procedures from manufacturers making you jump through hoops, I was considering just buying another cover to avoid the hassle. I decided to give the warranty a shot, and within a couple days of filing the information on their website I had a tracking number for a replacement on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett K

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice looking but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this cover looks. The material is seemingly pretty good. The only thing I do not like is the color change, it fades within a year; due to the weather it may develop holes. So be prepared to replace it every couple of years as I have. The green color that it turns to doesn’t match my decor, hence the reason I reorder. I guess for the price that’s not a bad deal. If you are looking for longevity, this isn’t the product for you. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsical Artisan

customer_reviews.title: PROTECTS YOUR GRILL AT A MODEST COST
customer_reviews.text: I've used another Classic-made cover for my front porch glider during the 5 winter-like months in Michigan, and it has held up well for 4 years so far. Not so for a different brand on my grill for the past three years. It also had a so-called breathing screen on the front, which let water into the fire-bed, which has some parts that are not rust proof, and which of course rusted. This cover is well made and has no such breathing feature. It also has a couple of lift-off handles which make it easier to put-on and take-off. It's made of the same material which has held-up so well on my glider.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: So Far, so Good!
customer_reviews.text: Grill covers, historically, have been a great disappointment to me -- tearing, discoloring and surface flaking in a season or more. This cover seems to be different. First, the color is an attractive tan and I don't suspect that spotty sun-bleaching and surface flaking will be problems compared to those in the traditional black color. The stitching on the product appears to be top-notch, the sewn-in handles very convenient in removing the cover from the grill and covering the grill. Fingers crossed -- hoping that this cover will last at least a couple of years. If so, I will replace the other 3 covers with Veranda covers.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Iovino

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and very heavy duty material
customer_reviews.text: The only time I write a review is when something does not meet expectations or when something exceeds expectations. This product falls into the second category with very heavy duty material, an excellent fit on my new Charbroil model 463274619. There is heavy duty nylon quick connects that go around each one of the wheels on the grill. There is also drawstrings on each side at the bottom to pull in the cover. I actually think this cover would survive a hurricane! I also like the color scheme much more than the boring black covers, this looks very nice on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Hower

customer_reviews.title: Well Built/Designed -- 2nd I've Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grill cover ... have the medium size on my Camp Chef SG pellet smoker with the Sidekick ... fits great and keeps the snow off (I live at 7,000 ft in the Rockies ... so we get lots of that). The cover has never leaked and the side vents work well at letting any residual moisture evaporate (e.g. humid days). I love the pocket on the front ... I store my temperature probes in it. The fabric held up well ... until I ripped it cleaning snow the grill with a snow shovel (lesson: don't do that). Like the cover to order it again as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Life Is Great

customer_reviews.title: Ripping and tearing within two years
customer_reviews.text: This cover got some excellent reviews when I ordered it. More recently it has been getting very poor reviews. I wish those reviews were available when I initially ordered. It lasted through one NJ winter with no problems. By the second winter it is falling apart. Tearing on the corners, but it hasn't faded that much. I am careful not to let snow build up on it, so the tearing is caused by the weight of the cover pulling down on the corners. I don't know if it is the heat, the cold or both that cause this to happen to all grill covers. But so far I have not found one that lasts more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Golly

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but keeps splitting
customer_reviews.text: We have had this grill cover for two years. It seems to be of good quality and looks nice, however, the cover keeps splitting in multiple places. Typically over the corners of the grill, which makes sense, but it seems those areas should be made stronger so that it doesn't split. We have patched the cover multiple times, only to have it split again in the same spot or in another location. Kind of frustrating. I'm not sure if this is typical of a fabric grill cover, but it is what we are experiencing with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review now but I should have written it three years ago. It came to mind as I was searching for a new grill cover to purchase. The cover was a bit awkward to use and heavy, which I wanted because ones I had in the past blew off. I mistakenly thought heaviness related to sturdiness but I was wrong. It lasted a season and then ripped to shreds. And I spent a lot more for it than the current price! I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NewYorker

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - develops tears after a year and is useless after two.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this grill cover for 2 years and 2 months. Initially, it looked great. My wife preferred the coloring over the typical black grill covers (color eventually got quite ugly after two years as well). It worked well. Within about a year, it had some small tears. After two years, it now has huge tears all over, so I am once again grill cover shopping (ahead of the upcoming winter). I'd recommend checking out another option. 2 stars because it is relatively cheap so I didn't exactly expect it to last as long as a nice grill cover (ie. weber) to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: BBQ Cover is exactly as described by the vendor. Appearance and quality seem outstanding for the price. Can’t speak to durability as I just got it. From the construction & materials I suspect the water resistance will certainly be adequate. I have forwarded questions regarding the specifics of the Classic Accessory Warrantee. The website assured that there is one & they will be happy to honor it..... but has no specifics as to what is Warranted or for how long. Based on my initial observations I would recommend this Vendor and product to others.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bevis

customer_reviews.title: NOT sunproof
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on July 12, 2016 - I bought this to cover my tile saw, which is stored in a corner against two brick walls and under the eves of those two walls. After two years there were holes in the top where it would be hit by the sun and there was slight tension. I sewed patches on those holes, but by the next year, more appeared. It is now completely useless and I have the cover covered in a blue tarp. I will not recommend and will not buy again, even for my gas grill. If the item you are covering is completely in shade, it might last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shevlin

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...but?
customer_reviews.text: I've had three grill covers from Classic Accessories. Two of them have been pretty good. The second one seemed to be the best (Classic Accessories SkyShield Heavy Duty Tyvek Adjustable Grill Cover, X-Large), but I gave that away with my old grill. Unfortunately, I had to buy this one as my new grill is 77-inches wide. I've just starting using this so am extrapolating based on previous experience. The beef is the information to register the grill cover is useless: it takes you to a weird website that seems to be selling warranty services????
customer_reviews.author: Dale M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We knew we wanted a grill cover to match our Adirondack covers and table cover, all Classic Accessories Veranda. This fits our grill perfectly - make sure you double check dimensions. Everything is completely dry each time we take off the cover, even if there is standing water on top. We have had our Classic Accessories Veranda Adirondack chair covers for 1.5 years (mostly in the Florida sun, now living in Washington state) and they are still holding up great so I expect this grill cover will be the same. This is a great line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but has a tear in it already
customer_reviews.text: We bought this not so long ago to cover our grill and noticed that it already has a tear in the material - not a very big tear but eventually it will get bigger. Not sure if this is caused by the weather, however a little disappointed that we've not had it for a couple of months or even a year. We are not rough handling the cover. I saw someone said that this product does have a 3 year warranty. I didnt know that so will be filling out the form. Else we love the cover and it does it's job and not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luvtoshop

customer_reviews.title: Simply The Best
customer_reviews.text: These products would still be a terrific buy at twice their price point. I have previously used their products to cover a teak table/chairs and chaise lounge in Southern California with terrific results. I now live in Minnesota and use the large BBQ cover to protect a Weber 4-burner located on an uncovered deck. The cover has performed as described in the snow and rain and I would not consider any other product. The quality and material are fantastic. After registering the product I received a confirmation email with contact info in case a warranty claim needs to be filed- which I do not anticipate.
customer_reviews.author: Bchbum49

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just over a year  ***UPDATE*** Just Received the Warranty Replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grill July 11, 2019. Here we are August 29, 2020 and I have to buy a new one. Love the concept, just not the implementation. I am willing to risk one more purchase, presuming I just got a bad one. We will see. ***UPDATE*** I reached out to the company and requested a warranty return. After a couple of email exchanges, I just received the replacement. We will see if the replacement holds up longer than the original. Great Customer Service, Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: coach georgeTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Tears Easily and Too Soon
customer_reviews.text: I bought it on 9/2018 and have several tears appearing where contact is made on corners or angles. It does not hold up well. I'm already looking for a new grill cover as this has begun to show more like a 5yr cover rather than 21months. Wish it would have held up better/longer. I'm in Texas and have it under a covered patio. Can't recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Agliata

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried about the color and hesitated to order this for quite a while. But because we really needed one , we took a chance. So very pleased with this. This is very sturdy and the color hasn't faded or gotten dirty as I thought it would. Very happy with this product and would order again if needed. Oh and the wind we have had this year has been horrible ! I mean everything from lounge chairs and outdoor tables have dumped into the pool. This cover has held up without any wear in tear and hasn't slipped off at all !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good company..
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cover that fit as described. The colors are true to the photo. I wanted to let anyone know that would be concerned about the quality that they can buy with confidence as the company will stand behind there warranty. I fell into the group that had use it due to a tare and severe fading / dry rott. They sent out a new one no fuss. I will buy from them again should my replacement tear and fade.
customer_reviews.author: Off the Hook

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful, a little snug on a 72 inch grill though.
customer_reviews.text: This fit very well, on my Brinkmann fairly well, though it is a little tight. Even though it is a 72 inch cover and my grill is a 72 inch grill, the cover could use a little slack on the ends so I don't have to worry about the sharp edges ripping my grill cover. The material feels very strong, but several repeats of putting it on and off I expect there to be some fabric wear in the corners of the grill cover because of how snug it was over my grill. There are little loops and clips for attaching it underneath the grill so if you are planning on long term storage it is really great!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to echo the views of other recent posts. I bought this in spring 2015 and the first summer was great. It's a nice, thick fabric sort of cover that isn't the typical cheap plastic. However, by summer #2 (2016) it developed several tears and by #3 (2017) there were big gashes that made the cover barely useful. Rain, snow, sun...all easily get in. I should've replaced it last year, but pushed it and have to buy another now. So as others have said - it's great for a year, but that's all you can expect from it before starting to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: JW OH

customer_reviews.title: I bought this same grill cover 6 years ago.  It's not the same as it was then.
customer_reviews.text: This is the EXACT same grill cover I purchased 6 years ago. This isn't the same quality it was back then. The design is largely identical, but the weight of the canvas is significantly less than it used to be -- I'd say they reduced it (the canvas weight) by about 35%-40%. I'll be happy if this new one holds up as long as the last one, which made it through 6 full years outdoors with only a few recent tears as the canvas became brittle. But I'm not expecting it to. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: JPE in MA

customer_reviews.title: The quality of workmanship is poor. Within few months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: The quality of workmanship is poor. Within few months of purchase, the cover ripped at one of the seams. It was about 4 inches, so I continued to use it. Within a year, the fabric started showing signs of stress and ultimately started tearing. Mind you, mu grill is exposed to sun round the year (pretty sure that is how everyone uses it). Over period of time the cover fell apart. I will say the design is pretty good. The handles are well designed and the other hardware is pretty solid. It is the quality of the fabric and workmanship that is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny MD

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible piece of crap!! Cheapened what was an exceptional product!! The older one (by about 4 years) is still holding strong. This cheapened crapcover is ripped to shreds by mediocre weather elements this winter-and very little sun exposure: and not worth 49 cents. The elastic cording and pinch hardware are a thousand times more valuable than the garbage they are now selling as an outdoor protective grill cover!!! Shame on the manufacturer for destroying their product!!!
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover!
customer_reviews.text: Great while it lasts, in my case 1 year and 10 month’s. Went through their warranty, and a new one was shipped straight away! So plan on getting 2-3 cover within the warranty period. It’s pretty easy to get it replaced. 5 stars for customer service, 4 stars for durability since it is in the sun 24/7. I took a picture of cover and the product code tag and sent a copy of my receipt from amazon and they sent me a new one. Buy it. Any cover will deteriorate outside.
customer_reviews.author: fatty

customer_reviews.title: Great product and truly hassle free warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd purchase (2 different grills). I like the material, stylish piping and contrasting border. Live in TX, brutal sun and year around grilling - — so 2-3 on/off per week. After 18 months, developed a tear on the seam right at the loop/handle. Classic Accessories said “hassle free warranty”. I filled out the form and provided my Amazon order #, date. The form had very clear instructions on what product # info to provide and where to find it. Decided to enclose pic of the tear. Week later my replacement cover arrived. Bottom line. Great product and they stand behind it!
customer_reviews.author: TX-laweed

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for this same cover, which lasted over 4 years (through snow and sun). The previous one faded a little bit, and had some mildew on the top, but functioned well and still looked good. Over that period of time it had gotten a little brittle, and when it ripped near the handle, I knew it was time to replace. I *really* don't mind replacing this every 4 years given the abuse it gets, and it is so much better than the original cover I had that lasted a few months before it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice quality. This replaced my old thin black plastic-y cover I found for $20 at a discount store with a week day in the title. The color is similar to the color of my house, so it blends in (disappears) much better. This one has thick waterproof canvas like fabric. Sits square/evenly on my big old grill. Has 4 clips on thick straps on the bottom to hold it down in a storm. I am impressed with this manufacturer. I’ve bought other items for my porch furniture. They’re all well made. I’ll stick with this brand if it ever wears out.
customer_reviews.author: VMBL

customer_reviews.title: *UPDATED* Garbage....cracked and ripped after 7 months...
customer_reviews.text: Update: Although the product did not event last a year, Classic Accessories warranty process was very easy and they shipped me a new cover after submitting a claim. I hope this one makes it longer than the last one. Original Review: If you are looking for a durable, weather resistant grill cover DO NOT buy this one. Mine lasted less than 7 months. It's cracking and torn and we honestly don't even use our grill that much so it's not from taking it on and off all of the time. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand! Perfect Fit for Nexgrill
customer_reviews.text: This cover is the perfect fit for my spanking ne 5 burner Nexgrill, and it matches the covers on my patio furniture. It's got a luttle room to spare in the width, and that makes it easire to put on! I have had excellent experience with this brand...it truly is durable, and water resistant, and does not fade in the sun. My patio is full sun pretty much year round, even in winter. As with past grill covers, I know that this cover will protect my new grill!
customer_reviews.author: Jonesie Girl

customer_reviews.title: A slow decline from 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, my cover started falling apart within a year. At first it was unraveling at the plastic latches, then it developed holes in the cover material. I’ve been able to sew patches on it to keep it working because there is no evidence of sun rot after a year of being in the outdoor weather. I wish this lasted longer and cost more. It’s a shame to buy any item that ends up in a landfill that could be made more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Fanny

customer_reviews.title: Best covers you can get for the money
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased these covers for a table and six chairs, the accompanying umbrella, a love seat, two chairs and a table and a deck box. I built the stand for this Weber portable barbecue to the specs of this cover so that I could match the rest of the covers in place. They are sturdy, well made with easy to use zippers, very attractive (the colors are perfect for the southwest where we live, and the first we bought (table chairs and umbrella) has gone through a year of monsoon rains, winter, and summer here in Taos NM and still looks and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Les Sogol

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We were initially very satisfied with this grill cover. It was well designed and quality seemed very good. After a year, the cover started discoloring to a dark brown and the seams became loose. It's now been 3 years and we are very disappointed. The cover has completely shredded at the seams and it's turned a dark brown color. It looks moldy which should not have happened. This cover is always exposed to the sun. This cover is no longer functional and I will be looking for another brand. As others have stated, it is not waterproof. For the cost, this cover should be. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: LAG

customer_reviews.title: Love the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the price, great fit - but you get what ... . Lasted 14 months (50% time stored) and totally disintegrated. First it was the straps, then the whole thing was leaving its particles all around the pool. If you're good with buying one annually - go for it.
customer_reviews.author: MartinH

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy. Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Initially happy with this cover. Two years later completely disappointed. Like others, mine has begun to tear at the corners (grill is NOT sharp there). It shows mold right away in1st summer..looks HORRIBLE on the inside... Looks moldy on the outside. My grill is in sun most of the day. The straps holding the clips on the bottom have dry rotted as well. The basic design is fine...the materials are not. I live in the mid Atlantic area. Regular 4 season weather.
customer_reviews.author: TelcoBill

customer_reviews.title: Canvas ripped after 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: After only 18 months, the canvas has ripped. I bought 2 bench covers, a table set cover, and a bbq cover along with the umbrella cover. I have rarely removed them. All now have rips in the canvas at pressure points. They look great, but the material sitting in the Los Angeles sun does not last. The material is becoming brittle. Very disappointed considering the amount of money I paid for 5 products from this company. I’d like replacements or refund please.
customer_reviews.author: pjfair

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I buy one of these covers about every two years. It takes a beating in AZ sun and wind and holds up well for a while. The sun eats everything up here eventually. This one arrived with a small hole at an intersection where the fabric didn't get caught in the seam. The exchange was effortless and the replacement cover arrived before I was able to get out to UPS to make the return. Excellent customer service. I highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+ Customer service and great durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large grill cover. It is very well made and durable. That said I did develop a couple of rips along the seams on two sides of the cover. I contacted customer service, who responded very promptly with directions on how to fill out a form. 1 week later I had a new cover. This company really stands behind its products. Even if they would not have replaced it under warranty, I would have bought a replacement from them because of how well their products are made. A+ for customer service and follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Smithgang

customer_reviews.title: Thank Goodness For Duct Tape
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know how long this cover is designed to last but I am very disappointed with my grill cover. I purchased this cover in 2015, September and used it in the Michigan outdoors. However, in a little over two years of use, it began to literally disintegrate. I still have it on my grill with duct tape all over it holding it together and trying to get one more season out of it. It looks hilarious and thank goodness for duct tape! On a side note, I talked my daughter into purchasing one of these for her grill and in two seasons, it split end to end. Even duct tape couldn't fix that one.
customer_reviews.author: frazan

customer_reviews.title: Good cover but only lasts 2 yrs.
customer_reviews.text: It shreds after two years of Southern California mild weather cycles. I’ve experienced that many times. I’ve accepted that since it fits my BBQ well. What you might not know is the warranty is Three (3) years. You can get one free if yours shreads w/i 3yrs. Remember this and go to their website or call them. Great people who stand behind their products. If anyone knows of cover that lasts longer, tell use all.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Held up well for 3 years in harsh Michigan weather. Buying again!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this grill cover in July 2016. After 4 years of continual use on my grill and year-round Michigan weather, it’s time to replace it. It really needed replacement last year (2019). It sits in direct day & evening light, so it’s really put to the test weather-wise. I’d say 3 years of harsh weather use for $30 is a pretty good deal. Previous grill covers wouldn’t even have lasted one season.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Woman

customer_reviews.title: Large and wide durable cover for grill.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of these covers so much that I bought matching covers for my outdoor dining table, grill and fire pit. My grill has two cooking stations, a searing station, and a pellet hopper. I needed a wide cover, and this one fits great! The handles make it easier to remove and install. The four buckles secure at each wheel, and the bungie draw string pulls the bottom tight. The front zippered pouch is convenient, but is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: R&R

customer_reviews.title: Fits Weber Spirit II E-310 nicely - great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure this would fit on my Weber Spirit II E-310 Gas Grill. Looking around the web and the manufacturers website and matching with a cover size left me wondering if it would look okay. Even measuring the grill came up with dimensions that differed from those on the Weber site. It fits great and is made with high quality waterproof vinyl. I prefer this color to the standard black. It even has two handles sewn in at the top to make it easy to position neatly on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt D

customer_reviews.title: Great - Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The delivery and service was great. I am more pleased with the product itself. Very good quality material, excellent sizing and a good fit (secure straps etc). Overall excellent value for money. I bought this to replace a grill cover which disintegrated over 18 months of Colorado’s seasons. I have a patio furniture cover from the same manufacturer that fits great and stood up really well to the elements over the same period. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: NHLmonkey

customer_reviews.title: attractive cover.
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to find a grill cover that fits my Weber Q with the side shelves down. Thumbs down to Weber for discontinuing the cover originally made to use this way. This cover, in X-small, fills the bill with not a lot of excess material. Still too new to evaluate long-terrm durability, but for the moment it is quite workable. The heavy duty corner straps should keep the cover from blowing away on very windy days (I've lost two Weber covers this way.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P. Smurf

customer_reviews.title: Warranty replaced...lasted 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I've had cheap plastic/felt junk covers that even lasted a couple years. This lasted less than 10 months which is totally unacceptable. It's unbelievably listed as "Amazon's Choice". AVOID THIS AT ALL COSTS! Submitted warranty request for it today, but there isn't a warranty incredible enough, nor service good enough to make up for this clearly inferior product. One would think a product with a 3 year warranty would last AT LEAST 3 years and one month..... UPDATE 1/6/2019: Classic Accessories replaced under warranty. Replacement cover lasted 7 months, disintegrated worse than the original cover. First photo is original cover, second photo was their WARRANTY REPLACEMENT. What a joke. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Classic Accessories is a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Listen. This is not a bribed review. Classic Accessories is a great value. You can't go wrong unless you all buy the item I want and they sell out before I can buy. Honestly, I have had this brand on outdoor chairs, umbrellas, and BBQs for three years. I wait to write reviews. Would I buy this brand again? Absolutely without hesitation. Best value on Amazon. I just purchased a new grill, and this is the review for my new cover. My other items are still going strong. great value.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Classic Accessories Veranda Grill Cover, Medium This fit my BBQ perfectly and it matched the measurements given. The fabric is woven and waterproof. So far it is withstanding rainstorms without any issues. In Southern California, we BBQ year round so being able to access it is very important. This is easy on and off and secures with an elastic cord at the base. It hasn't blown off in the Santa Ana winds either. I am very happy with this and it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Bad sewing, bad looking!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them to cover my big and small outdoor grills. The small one is endurable. But big one has not good looking sewing and looking. It looked so awkward and not smooth to see it. I am not buying just to protect it. The outside looking is important as much as the protection level. I returned the big one but the seller refunded me only half! I didn't damage it at all. I just covered it outside. They can sell it as a new one! Such a cheap owner!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Survives a good three years
customer_reviews.text: I got this in spring 2015 for my Weber (E320) gas grill. It has served well in Northern Midwestern location for 3 1/2 years. During spring through fall I grill 3-4 times per month, and during winter, whenever the temperature is above 40 F. I notice that most wear and tear occurs when operating below about 60 F, when the cover handles more stiffly. For the price (less than $30) it has served me well. I just looked up a canvas repair kit, it costs $10, so I think I'll get a new cover instead.
customer_reviews.author: Firstrock

customer_reviews.title: Not at all Durable!  Literally fell apart in a year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover a year ago, it ripped in the seams at the top and along the sides. It states it is a durable cover and is on every list of the best grill covers but the only thing going for it is the color. I wanted lighter color to go with my decor on the deck, I also thought lighter would be better in the sun, but it didn't matter this didn't last long at all and I paid a$37+ for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well made
customer_reviews.text: Cover is well designed and well made. Fabric is good quality, as well. Fit is great because it is longer than most covers ( almost reaches the floor on my three burner Jenn Aire grill) which has definitely foiled the red wasps constantly trying to make a nest in the grill. It is also good a keeping the red dirt/dust of Alabama off the grill and the velcro tabs and drawstring in the hem also keep the cover on in the weather.
customer_reviews.author: nahenders

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my old "lightweight" cover.
customer_reviews.text: Material for cover is very thick and durable, seam stitching is nicely finished, has ventilation flaps to minimize condensation and mildew, handles sewn in at the top to grasp when removing or replacing, and the shape is perfect for my grill. It also has straps that fasten to the legs/wheels to secure it in windy conditions, but the cover feels heavy enough that I don't think I will need to use them
customer_reviews.author: digiphoto

customer_reviews.title: It does not appear to be the quality they claim.
customer_reviews.text: I believe this was sold as "The Best Grill Cover". It looks great. ,made of Good, Solid Material but the stitching is poor in two locations causing the seam to separate. This isn't a result of pulling or too tight a fit. In fact the cover is slightly large for my 6 burner Weber Summit. This is more of a quality control issue than it is poor workmanship. It should have been caught and repaired before it left the factory. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ZiggyGar

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 star rating is for customer service! I bought this back in October of 2014. I live in Colorado, very dry and lots of sun. So yes, it has come to the dry rot point and tore. I noticed on my order it said 3 year warranty, so I went to their website and filled out the warranty claim form... expecting to hear the normal BS about "normal wear and tear". The next email I got about a day and a half later was an email with shipping info of my new cover! Impressive!!! Thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kiser

customer_reviews.title: attrcuve cover-a it tight
customer_reviews.text: The cover is attractive substantially made but is a very snug fit on Weber Genesis II four burner grill. Buy the larger one. The cover arrived ostraps with velcro closure to secure to legs on the grill. a draw type cord to help secure it as well as n time. in good condition. The cover The cover contains a large zippered pocket in the fromt -no suggestion on how to use the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: jriorda

customer_reviews.title: Tears too easily
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 of these - one for our current BBQ and 2 for the previous one. They are cheap, look nice and fit right but they inevitably get long rips in them just from sitting on the BBQ. I think they dry out or otherwise lose their durability and after a year or two, it doesn't take more than just wind blowing across the BBQ for them to tear along the places where they meet the edge of the BBQ. Such a bummer because they are otherwise perfect. I supposed if you keep your BBQ indoors or in incredibly mild climate, they might last longer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Masen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Universal fit grill cover!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Weber Summit grill and using old black grill cover from Lowe’s. It fit but slightly too short not covering bottom of grill, torn and now gray. Ordered this cover cuz from same company as my patio furniture, which I’ve loved. Heavy duty, well fitting, and so far, fade resistant. Grill cover fit perfectly and was contoured to make it hang correctly with handles to help remove and put on and small pocket in front. Also has buckle tie downs.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second one of these. Unfortunately my last one was destroyed but in a tornado with hail so that would be expected. I was presently surprised when I got the first one. I was expecting just a cover but this is much sturdier than I thought it would be. I am acutually thinking about buying their patio covers now. Its a great grill cover especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware of this manufacturer. After determining that I had ordered the wrong size, I was past the Amazon deadline for a return/exchange. I called the manufacturer's customer service number and was told I simply had to file a warranty claim, and they would process an exchange. I went through the process of filing a warranty claim, only to be told repeatedly that I needed to handle through Amazon - who had told me to contact the manufacturer direct. Awful customer service. I won't buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: JohnCCTX

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to spruce up my porch a little bit. I always get the cheapest cover I can get but the UV rays here (7,500 ft elevation) trash material left outdoors. This was large enough for my grill with prep shelves on both sides and a burner on the side. It seems like a durable material (better than the old covers I've purchased). I can't say how long it will last but it looks good and seems like it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan hale

customer_reviews.title: This looks super classic and great on my deck
customer_reviews.text: This looks super classic and great on my deck. Covers our Weber grill perfectly. Truly repels water. Unfortunately we're on our second one of these because after two years it's ripped completely in half from being out in the elements year round. It's great looking and affordable. I guess two years is longevity? That's why I gave it four stars. Should note that I live on a very windy water front. That definitely says something. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small pellet grill and ordered this. It was the smallest we could find. It fits perfect except for the length is too long which we just roll it up. It is very sturdy material and made very well. It has handles to lift it off the grill and air vents on the sides. It also has hooks for securing from the wind. I was really impressed with the price and durability. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Crickster

customer_reviews.title: Quality, quality, quality
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with the quality of this grill cover. Not being able to actually see the material and feel it we went by appearance and are very pleased. It fits great and we really like the straps that go around the wheels. I am very impressed with the workmanship of this cover. I'm surprised it was so reasonable. We expected something rather cheap for what we paid and were willing to have to replace it in a few years. This should last a long time. Quite a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Zoot

customer_reviews.title: A good grill cover, for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first grill cover - this exact same model and vendor - four years ago. It finally bit the dust, over this past winter. In its defense, our grill faces due west, is on our deck right up against the brick of our house, and catches all the summer heat and weather. We would prefer that the first one lasted longer than four years, but for the price, I'm not complaining. We ordered this again for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Alexmom

customer_reviews.title: Single season use, not durable and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on June 17th 2019. It's April 2020 and it's faded full of holes and generally an inferior product. We keep our grill stored inside all winter so this product has about 6 or 7 months outside. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Super User

customer_reviews.title: Fits my blackstone griddle perectly
customer_reviews.text: I am always impressed at the quality of the covers from Classic Accessories Their 3 year warranty can't be beat. They have tough seams, breathable flaps, two nice handles to grab and lift the cover off as well as nice clasps to secure your cover. Even with the lower profile of my Blackstone griddle, this cover fits like a glove. I will continue to go back to Classic Accessories for other covers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason101

customer_reviews.title: Grill cover made from quality material with quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice grill cover. I needed a short grill cover for my Weber Silver A grill. No one makes short covers anymore, the kind that just cover the grill and leave the bottom open. I did not want a long cover. SO... I bought this grill cover in the medium-small, it was the correct dimensions except it was too long (too much height). I cut the middle section out of the cover about 22 inches and then sewed the bottom section (dark part) back to the tapered top part that covered the grill/table. A couple of hours work but the result was a perfect short grill cover. This cover is made from very nice material and is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I thought I loved this cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover. It is very well made and the handle allow for easy removal. This cover is on my grill outdoors all winter in Maine and is holding up very nicely. The fit is awesome. Update 3/12/2020: I hadn't used the grill in a few weeks, until yesterday. As I grabbed the handles to uncover the grill I noticed a tear at one seam. Upon further inspection the other handle also has ripped at the seam. The material has dried out considerably in 16 months and I will have to replace it soon. Too bad, I really did like this cover. See attached photos
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Covers!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Fit my BBQ perfectly. Love that it secures at the bottom OF THE PIECE it’s protecting. We have winds at our home that frequently exceed 100mph (not a typo... that’s one hundred) and not only has this product not come loose as those from other manufacturers have, but there is no sign of stress wear at the seams. BRAVO to the supplier. I bought theee items this year as I was not sure whether they would hold up to our environment or not, but we have lots of outdoor furniture which remains unprotected. Next year, I will buy enough from them to cover everything we own!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made; bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: This grill cover lasted just a couple of months, before the stitching came apart. It had already been letting water inside, though weak stitching areas after about a month of use. I live in a moderate climate that had no harsh weather over the summer that this was used. The temperature never got over 93 F and wind was minimal. This thing was poorly crafted.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, nice quality, exactly as pictured (60” version)
customer_reviews.text: Just got the cover and am very impressed by the apparent quality. It fit my 60 inch grill perfectly and feels high quality to the touch. Nice two tone look as well. We will see how it holds up, but the color scheme and construction quality seem similar to some Amazon Basics furniture covers I bought a couple of years ago. They have held up very well so I’m optimistic. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F

customer_reviews.title: Bought this one in 2015
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover in 2015. It held up for the past 5 seasons, completely exposed to the elements. Needed a new one, and figured I would try a different one, black and $10+ more expensive. Big mistake. This one is and looks so much better. From the material, to the other features, and the plastic buckles on the bottom. There is real quality in this one. The one I just purchased will probably last less time, and looks really cheap. For the price, I don't think you can beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Mae

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: This was my second cover. The first one lasted for 5 1/2 years. I liked how it was made and the durability. With that when it was time for a new one I purchased the same one. To my surprise it only lasted a year and a half. Rather disappointing thinking it should have been good for longer than that. I don't know if they changed their material or possibly had a bad batch. I tried calling but they're afraid to talk to people due to the stupid covid-19 story.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. This is the third one I've purchased. The first one survived 18 months and the second survived 2 years in the Georgia sun. Other brands I've tried barely make through a season. These things take direct sun and none last for years, in fact, most might give you 6-10 months. The pocket is a great place for my grill brush. It has snaps that secure it to the grill wheels on one side. This keeps it from blowing off in a strong storm. The material is the right thickness unlike some others that are very thin. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: tdg

customer_reviews.title: Best long lasting cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second veranda grill cover. It lasts about 5 or so seasons in Maryland weather which is longer than any other cover I have owned. I also have the fire pit and air conditioning covers. The cover is somewhat heavy which is a negative for those with bad backs. However, the lightweight ones do not last even one season in heavy wind. So I will continue to buy this brand as long as they sell it.
customer_reviews.author: Emerald Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but does not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought my grill cover exactly two years ago to this month. It is falling apart and I need to purchase a replacement. The problem isn't fading -- that happened after the first six months. I can live with faded colors for a beige cover. What really is sad is that the fabric falls apart at the seams. It starts ripping and coming apart. Nuts! as otherwise I liked the cover. Really bad quality of material for the seams unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Al from Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart Again!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Grill Cover from Amazon in August of 2018. It fell apart and I sent for a replacement as it was still under warranty. The replacement came in April/May 2020. It’s now September 2020 and the cover is already falling apart and of course it’s now considered out of the original warranty time period. The side has a gaping hole in it from sun exposure, I assume. I will ask for a second replacement but doubt I’ll get one. Never hurts to try.
customer_reviews.author: Granmana

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, but doesn’t last...
customer_reviews.text: After getting tired of buying grill covers from the local hardware stores that wouldn’t last long, I thought I’d look online and found this one. The cover is heavy, so heavy in fact I didn’t need to use the under-grill belts to keep it on during storms. The handles are located on both sides making it easy to remove. Now after about two years the cover is tearing around one of the handles bad enough that I need to start looking for another cover. If it wasn’t for such a short lifespan of the product it would have been an easy 5 stars. Now I can only give it three.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ritchey

customer_reviews.title: AAA PLUS QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: After being disappointed in a previous purchase, I just received this cover and so far am very impressed and satisfied with the quality. It fits my KitchenAid gas grill perfectly with room to spare and no chance for ripping. The handles make it super easy to place or remove the cover. I haven’t submitted a rating for weather related issues because we’ve had zero rain since my purchase. Hopefully it will meet my expectations during the cold blustery winters here in Chicago.
customer_reviews.author: MOBinDG

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased one of these to cover my gas grill. Far superior and much better priced than anything at the home improvement stores. I then needed something to cover our two outside wicker chairs and I bought another. They both fit underneath and are well protected from the NE Ohio elements. I would recommend this product most highly!!
customer_reviews.author: Bishop Edward Niam DD

customer_reviews.title: Good cover - cinch cord does not seem durable
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this cover is better than other covers I've used in the past. The reason why I am giving it just 4 stars is because the cinch cord at the bottom could be a lot better. I don't get much cinch as I feel like I'm going to break the cord if I pull too hard. Since I am not able to get a good cinch at the bottom, the cover does blow in the wind, and if it wasn't for the velcro straps that I strap to the grill wheels, the cover could tear/blow off.
customer_reviews.author: alh

customer_reviews.title: Best grill cover ive ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by the cost to quality of this product. Its probably the best value of anything ive gotten off of amazon. The material is thick nylon. It has clips so it doesnt blow off and vents so condensation doesnt rust out your grill. Its a much better quality than what you find at lowes, home depot, or Academy, but at a much cheaper price. Im very satisfied as a Texas griller.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! I have a Commercial Series Charbroil gas grill that is approx. 55 inches in length. I ordered the 58 inch cover and it fits perfectly. The front side of the cover has a zippered compartment for tools or what have you. Also love the wheel straps and pull cord to secure the cover around the bottom. This cover has exceeded my expectations. I was buying cheaper quality/same cost covers at our local retail store and they would only last for one season. The quality of the fabric on this cover will last for a long time I think. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suess

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover to replace tired Weber branded covers for my Weber Genesis Silver-B grill and Weber 18 1/2" Smokey Mountain smoker. I like the colors, they blend nicely with the paint scheme on my patio. Material quality and construction seems to be consistent with the price. I don't know why they put a zippered pouch on the grill cover and that is likely a feature I will never use. My patio is covered and protected from the afternoon sun so hopefully these covers will age more gracefully than those seen in other reviews of this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Oates

customer_reviews.title: Oversized Compared to Description
customer_reviews.text: I just put this cover on and it seems to be of good quality. The main comment I have is that it is larger than the dimensions provided. It drags on the ground, at least for my grill. The measured height from the top piping (the horizontal top, just above the zipper) to the bottom is 48". The description shows a height of 44" for this Medium Small size. Not a big deal though, I just have it bunched up at the bottom with the hem cord and clips.
customer_reviews.author: rjg426

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill cover!
customer_reviews.text: 6/29/2020 This fits my new Weber Genesis II E-335 natural gas grill perfectly! I’m glad I gave it a chance. I have other pieces on my patio from this line and they’ve held up well and I expect this cover to do the same. I love the light color, clips and pocket. Was much cheaper than the Weber cover, looks nicer and feels sturdier too. This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom04

customer_reviews.title: Had it for 6 months - Doing Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago to replace our old grill cover that got damaged in a move. This new cover is GREAT! Love the tan color and is easy to get on and off. It has a handle on it that makes it easy to pull off. So far it still looks new and is holding up to the rain and hail we have had here in Texas just fine. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowChaser

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This originally seemed like a nice, quality grill cover, but now I have to say it's garbage. I only use it about half the year when the grill is out (around April through September) and it didn't even last me through the second season. It has a massive rip on it, without being used, manhandled, or pulled. It just wore thin and ripped wide open in the wind. Wish it was more robust. I would expect it to get through a couple Chicago Spring/Summers without an issue. The last cover we had that came with the grill, lasted easily 5 years, including a winter or 2. This was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: truly the best grill I've ever purchased. think and heavy duty. oversized which is great meaning it slides over the grill perfectly and ties at the bottom. the material is extremely heavy DUTY meaning it will live for quite sometime. very clean and love the light color. price is unheard of for this product it's a GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good long-term option
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover 2 years and 7 months ago. It has been outside on our partially sheltered deck throughout that time and is definitely showing the wear and tear. A large rip in the fabric has developed on its own, and one of the seams is falling apart. I will be reaching out to the company regarding the 3 year limited warranty to see if this can be replaced - I expected it to last longer than it has.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it a 4 on durability is because it doesn't stand up in Arizona very well. We got the same product line for our outdoor furniture and they will last another year maybe two. If it was anywhere else I think it would last longer but the sun damage to many things here is brutal. The price point is good though
customer_reviews.author: shutter bug

customer_reviews.title: 3 years. July 2016 - July 2019
customer_reviews.text: This is on a grill in my backyard in Texas. Heat is intense, but it's got shade for a decent portion of the day. This lasted almost exactly 3 years. But it went from hero to zero very quickly. It was fine and then it just literally fell apart. I don't grill much, but this was always just fine until it totally wasn't. Not a bad deal to get 3 years out of it I guess. Not sure how long you can expect cloth to last when exposed to the elements?
customer_reviews.author: ATXexas

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I fits a 6 burner next grill fine. Packing wrinkles are still falling out after a month. It looks nice. The handles on top help removal so the seams on corners don’t pull on the grill shelves ( this is where my previous cover split and tore after a year of use ). It is relatively thin material. If it lasts , I’ll be really happy
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Weed

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these (different sizes) to cover my smoker and 4 burner griddle. Unfortunately it would not stay on and allowed the griddle to get wet even when the cover was on. I will be sanding down and re-seasoning my griddle top now. It stayed on my smoker because the chimney on the smoker makes it difficult to get off easy.
customer_reviews.author: Gammie

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories 73922 Veranda Water-Resistant 64 Inch BBQ Grill Cover,Pebble,Large
product_meta.description: Size:LargeClassic Accessories Veranda Premium Grill Cover, Large, 64 Inch.
feature_bullets: The classic accessories difference: CA Veranda covers have interior bound seams for strength, high-density stitching for durability, padded handles for comfort, matching webbing for a great look and California Prop 65 compliance for health and safety
Premium grill covers: Fits barbecue grills 64"L x 24"D x 48"H
Weber grill cover: Fits Weber Genesis & Genesis II gas grill models E-310, E-330, E-410, EP-310, EP-330, S-310 and S-330, along with many other popular brands (Brinkmann, CharBroil, Jenn Air, etc)
BBQ covers with warranty: Three-year limited warranty
Weber is a registered trademark of Weber-Stephen Products LLC; Classic Accessories is not affiliated or associated with Weber-Stephen Products, LLC or its products in any way
Custom-fit barbecue cover: Click-close straps snap at front to secure cover on the windiest days while an elastic hem cord with toggles allows adjustment for a tight and custom-like fit
Durable grill cover with advanced features: Air vents reduce inside condensation and wind lofting, padded handles for easy fitting and removal
Outdoor patio collection: You'll be sure to find the right covers to fit your needs with over 140 shapes and styles in the Veranda Collection from Classic Accessories
Not designed to entirely cover the wheels or legs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars14,792 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
